jade.core.security.permission
Class PermissionHelper

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.security.permission.PermissionHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
jade.core.ServiceHelper
public class PermissionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements jade.core.ServiceHelper

This class provides an agent all methods for accessing security functionalities related to the permission service. In normal conditions, all agents on a container share the same permissionHelper istance. Agents retrieve the PermissionHelper by using getHelper() method of the Agent class.

Version:
$Date: 2004-07-31 14:52:51 +0200 (sab, 31 lug 2004) $ $Revision: 486 $
Author:
Giosue Vitaglione - Telecom Italia Lab

init

public void init(jade.core.Agent a)
